file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: "API da semana do backend"
  version: "1.0.0"
  title: "Semana do Backend"
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:4466
    description: Local server
  - url: http://146.190.226.218:4466
    description: Remote server
tags:
- name: "auth"
  description: "Access to auth"
- name: "user"
  description: "Access to User"

paths:
  # auth
  /auth/login:
    $ref: 'src/auth.yaml#/components/Login'
  /auth/check_token:
    $ref: 'src/auth.yaml#/components/CheckToken'
  /auth/refresh_token:
    $ref: 'src/auth.yaml#/components/RefreshToken'
  /auth/update_password:
    $ref: 'src/auth.yaml#/components/UpdatePassword'

  # user
  /user/{id}:
    $ref: 'src/user.yaml#/components/GetOneOrDelete'
  /user:
    $ref: 'src/user.yaml#/components/UserCrud'
    
components:
  securitySchemes:
    basicAuth:   
      type: http
      scheme: basic
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
      description: "Auth header (Authorization) Access Token"
    bearerRefreshAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
      description: "RefreshToken"
  schemas:
    BackendException:
      type: object 
      properties:
        error: 
          type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/auth/check_token": at 1:552: external "src/auth.yaml": get: file: local file reference is not allowed
